WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,

For my testing i created some packages (FrontMotion, Acrobat DC). And i created it with same name for each (example "Acrobat DC") For some reason packages won't appear in WPP (???), but still in WSUS (I push it as rejected).

There is a way to clean my crappy entries ? How to check fine/crap entry in WPP ?

Another issue is that if i'm creating package, if i reload WPP, existing packages vanishing and the update section is empty... How can i do ?

Thanks a lot

Comments.Message:
Auto update, i just checking in Settings > Updates.
There is a option "Show Locally-Published Updates that are also visible in Wsus Console"

So all is fine, you can close the issue ;-)
